snippet: A hiker who stumbled upon the camera in a stream in the Adirondacks found 581 pictures on its memory card, and he was determined to use them to find its owner.
abstract: A hiker who stumbled upon the camera in a stream in the Adirondacks found 581 pictures on its memory card, and he was determined to use them to find its owner.

headline.main: After 3 Years Lost in Forest, a Camera Reveals Secrets to Its Home
headline.print_headline: After 3 Years in the Adirondacks, a Lost Camera Reveals Secrets to Its Home Far Away
